text: is a 1986 Japanese-French adventure comedy-drama movie. It is about two animals, Milo (an orange tabby cat) and Otis (a pug). The original Japanese version, narrated by Shigeru Tsuyuki and with poetry recitation by Ky≈çko Koizumi, was released on June 27, 1986. Columbia Pictures removed 15 minutes from the original movie and released a shorter English-language version, narrated by Dudley Moore, on August 25, 1989. ==References== Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:1980s family movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Japanese movies Category:Movies about cats Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Adventures of Milo and Otis
